s: Personally, I think the iTouch is a better fitness tracker than the Fitbit. All things considered, it’s okay for the price. ... Update on this item. After using the watch for a while, it does not accurately record your steps. I know for a fact on one day I watched over 15,000 steps as my friend and I walked a trail and this watch recorded that I walked 1245 for the day. It is comfortable and easy to set up. But go with the better brands...
